Detailed Description

Manages a list of Error-s (or children objects). Provides basic methods for this management.

Errors::Add (  Error $  item  ) 
 

Adds an Error to the Sites if it is different than NULL. Error-s are indexed by their code.

Parameters:
$item the Error to add
